text:

you've looked at something

for too long, you're
not going to be

able to look at it with
fresh eyes, not for a while.

So it's helpful to have someone
else come and say, look.
This is why you should do this.

Let's start with Andy.

So just looking at this resume,

That means that
it would probably

So we're moving

There are no bullet

So I have your

A little bit of

Kind of confusing.
